        public SQLStateType getSqlStateType()
        Description copied from interface: ExtractedDatabaseMetaData
        Retrieve the type of codes the driver says it uses for SQLState. They might follow either the X/Open standard or the SQL92 standard.
        Specified by:
        getSqlStateType in interface ExtractedDatabaseMetaData
        Returns:
